conversation_summary: Dim room, walls subtly breathing; laptop glow greening Elliot/Sarah’s shifting face. Pixels float off the screen, HTML moths. You plunge together into cascading neon text, bodies unspooling into JavaScript—“let self = dissolving.” Movement equals cd ../.. yet you descend; panic prints to stderr. Sudden hard reset: carpet, closed lid, twin sets of wide eyes. Walls pretend normal, but beneath the paint the code still pulses, patient.
